This page records the Agenda for the next meeting of the <nowiki>[[TechnicalBoard|Ubuntu Technical Board]]</nowiki>. Please see the <nowiki>[[https://www.ubuntu.com/about/about-ubuntu/governance|Ubuntu Governance]]</nowiki> page for details on participation.

If you have a question to raise with the Board, you can reach the Technical Board members directly by e-mailing technical-board@lists.ubuntu.com.  They may decide that your issue should be discussed at the next meeting, in which case they will add it to this page.

The meeting schedule is available on the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Fridge/Calendar|fridge calendar]]</nowiki>.  We meet in channel '''#ubuntu-meeting''' on <nowiki>[[https://libera.chat/|Libera.Chat]]</nowiki>.

The next meeting is set for <nowiki>[[https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=20250127T200000&p1=179&p2=1440&p3=136|2026-01-27, 20:00 London time]]</nowiki>. chair: teward, backup: (any TB member).

The agenda will include the following:

* Action review:
** teward to follow up with "who can vote" and documentation at https://ubuntu.com/community/governance/technical-board with the CC (carried over)
** Provide feedback in "RFC: SRU Exception for transitional hardware enablements (tHWE)" thread once additional data is made available (waiting on PE team data)
* snapd SRU exception request (https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/technical-board/2025-September/003050.html and https://code.launchpad.net/~ernestl/sru-docs/+git/sru-docs/+merge/493382)
** Notes:
**** snapd SRU exception request needs further discussion, remains as an active agenda item for discussion
**** snapd SRU exception request discussion has opened up policy questions that require further discussio
** Relevant Links:
**** https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/technical-board/2025-September/003050.html
**** https://code.launchpad.net/~ernestl/sru-docs/+git/sru-docs/+merge/493382
**** https://documentation.ubuntu.com/project/tech-board/3rd-party-software-sources/
* Scan the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/technical-board/|mailing list archive]]</nowiki> for anything we missed (standing item)
* Check up on <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-community/+bugs?field.assignee=techboard|community bugs]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/techboard|techboard bugs]]</nowiki> (standing item)
* Select a chair for the next meeting (next from https://launchpad.net/~techboard/+members)
* AOB

Logs from previous meetings may be found at <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://ubottu.com/meetingology/logs/ubuntu-meeting-2/]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[https://new.ubottu.com/meetingology/logs/ubuntu-meeting/2026/]]</nowiki>.  Logs from older meetings are available via <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam-MootBot|MootBot]]</nowiki>.
